section.p: For installing the Monitoring Service, a machine is required with:

li.p: Docker 1.13. For details, refer to the Docker documentation.

Docker Compose binary as included in the CMM_server_2.0.x.tar.gz file. In the subsequent sections, it is assumed that you copied the docker-compose-Linux-x86_64_1.15.0 file to the /usr/local/bin/ directory and renamed it to docker-compose.

section.p: Depending on the Elasticsearch requirements resulting from your production environment, it is recommended that you customize the default Elasticsearch configuration provided by the Monitoring Service installation. For details on preparations related to Elasticsearch in productive use, refer to the Monasca Docker documentation.

note.p: It is recommended that you configure data retention for Docker container logs. Refer to for details.
